root: ^What am I doing? How did I suddenly end up here?
^A school in the wild, a dude who grows scales, an unknown old friend of grandma... Today feels like a fever dream.
^I guess I just need some time to adapt... Maybe everything will happen to make sense tomorrow.
^Don’t worry, River. It’s just 10 days. If anything goes wrong, you just sneak away.
^Now, let me see how this couch bed works…
